parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Seat Back Recliner Mechanism Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front seat back recliner mechanism can cause the seat to collapse or recline unexpectedly, potentially leading to loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The seat back reclines or collapses unexpectedly
the seat back does not lock into an upright position
the seat back falls back when accelerating or stopping
the seat back moves or reclines on its own
the seat back collapses fully during impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pedal Hardening and Brake Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hardening of the brake pedal and brake failure can lead to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities, as the vehicle may not be able to stop in time.
symptoms: The brake pedal hardens
the brakes fail
the vehicle is unable to stop
the airbags may not deploy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The grinding and pulsing of the front brakes can cause uneven wear on the brake pads and rotors, leading to reduced braking performance and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The front brakes grind
the front brakes pulse
the vehicle shakes when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can lead to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities, as the vehicle may not be able to stop or maintain control during emergency braking situations.
symptoms: The ABS system fails
the vehicle is unable to stop or maintain control during emergency braking
the brakes may lock up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the brake pedal to harden or fail, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: The master cylinder fails
the brake pedal hardens
the brakes fail.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission gear indicator can cause confusion and potentially lead to accidents, as the driver may not be aware of the vehicle's gear position.
symptoms: The transmission gear indicator is stuck or faulty
the driver is unsure of the vehicle's gear position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to engine damage, overheating, and potentially cause accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle consumes excessive amounts of oil
often requiring frequent oil changes
and may exhibit signs of engine damage
such as engine knocking or stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Defect Leading to Oil Consumption
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine defect can cause excessive oil consumption, leading to engine damage, overheating, and potentially cause accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle consumes excessive amounts of oil
often requiring frequent oil changes
and may exhibit signs of engine damage
such as engine knocking or stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: EGR valve failure can cause the vehicle to stall without warning, often when turning or crossing over traffic, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls without warning
often when turning or crossing over traffic
and may exhibit signs of engine stalling or surging.
